verses.verse: I will extol <S%H7311><s%> you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, for you have raised me up, <S%H1802><s%> and have not made my foes <S%H341><s%> to rejoice over me. <S%H8055><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> I cried <S%H7768><s%> to you, <S%H7495><s%> and you have healed me.

Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> you have brought up <S%H5927><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from Sheol. <S%H7585><s%> You have kept me alive, <S%H2421><s%> that I should not go down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit. <S%H953><s%>
Sing <S%H2167><s%> praise to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> you saints <S%H2623><s%> of his. <S%H3034><s%> Give thanks to his holy <S%H6944><s%> name. <S%H2143><s%>

For his anger <S%H639><s%> is but for a moment. <S%H7281><s%> His favor <S%H7522><s%> is for a lifetime. <S%H2416><s%> Weeping <S%H1065><s%> may stay <S%H3885><s%> for the night, <S%H6153><s%> but joy <S%H7440><s%> comes in the morning. <S%H1242><s%>
As for me, <S%H559><s%> I said in my prosperity, <S%H7959><s%> "I shall never <S%H5769><s%> be moved. <S%H4131><s%>"

You, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, when you favored <S%H7522><s%> me, <S%H2042><s%> made my mountain stand <S%H5975><s%> strong; <S%H5797><s%> but when you hid <S%H5641><s%> your face, <S%H6440><s%> I was troubled. <S%H926><s%>
I cried <S%H7121><s%> to you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh. To Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> I made supplication: <S%H2603><s%>

"What profit <S%H1215><s%> is there in my destruction, <S%H1818><s%> if I go down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit? <S%H7845><s%> Shall the dust <S%H6083><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> you? <S%H5046><s%> Shall it declare your truth? <S%H571><s%>
Hear, <S%H8085><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and have mercy <S%H2603><s%> on me. <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, be my helper. <S%H5826><s%>"

You have turned <S%H2015><s%> my mourning <S%H4553><s%> into dancing <S%H4234><s%> for me. <S%H6605><s%> You have removed my sackcloth, <S%H8242><s%> and clothed <S%H247><s%> me with gladness, <S%H8057><s%>

To the end that my heart <S%H3519><s%> may sing <S%H2167><s%> praise to you, <S%H1826><s%> and not be silent. Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> I will give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to you forever! <S%H5769><s%>
